question: You have a Facebook friend living in another country and s/he is curious to learn about a major news item in your country.Write a letter to your Facebook friend. In your letterdescribe a news story in your countryexplain why people are interested in itsay how the story personally relates to youYou do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: It was a while since we talked, hope your trip to Germany was great.
This year, my country Jordan was nominated to host the "Art and Music" festival, which will fall in June.

I know that this month will be the end of your term at university and I was wondering if you can arrange your next trip to attend this festival. This festival will be different from the one that you visited last year in Spain, since it will host different artists and signers, for instance, Amr Diab will have two continuous shows, Andy Fred will do a magic show and much more activities which I am sure you will be interested to see.
In addition to this, I will be joining a traditional artist for the first time and doing multiple shows and it will be great to see you there and support me .
I am so excited to hear back from you and let me know that you will attend the festival.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker since. Consider removing the comma.
